name: Minwoo Jeong
bio_html:
Minwoo worked as a bioinformatician in An Lab, where he co-developed CWAS-Plus, an advanced framework for estimating category-wide association of rare noncoding variation from whole-genome sequencing data with cell-type-specific functional data. As a co-first author (Kim Y✻, Jeong M✻ et al., Briefings in Bioinformatics, 2024), he substantially contributed to expanding the original CWAS methodology introduced by Werling et al. (2018).민우는 안랩에서 생물정보분석가로 근무하며 CWAS-Plus 개발에 참여하였습니다. CWAS-Plus는 세포 유형별 기능 데이터를 활용하여 전장유전체 시퀀싱 데이터에서 희귀 비번역 변이의 카테고리 단위 연관성을 추정하는 고급 프레임워크입니다. 공동 제1저자로서(Kim Y✻, Jeong M✻ et al., Briefings in Bioinformatics, 2024) Werling et al. (2018)이 도입한 기존 CWAS 방법론의 확장에 크게 기여하였습니다.

Publications논문

  • Kim Y✻, Jeong M✻, Koh IG, Kim C, Lee H, Kim JH, Yurko R, Kim IB, Park J, Werling DM, Sanders SJ, An JY†, CWAS-Plus: Estimating category-wide association of rare noncoding variation from whole-genome sequencing data with cell-type-specific functional data, Briefings in Bioinformatics, 2024
